### POST Send a new message

Resource URL: /communications/emails/sender

Headers:

* x-access-token:eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..GPf--Qs5ftDqhbj-vBXSiunPKEVIFcd1clS7Rz8CXpE

Sample request body:

{
  "emailsList":"3",
  "subject":"TEST",
  "body":"<p>TESTBODY</p>\n",
  "hiringClientId":"1",
  "subcontractorId":1, 
  "dueDate":"2018-05-16T00:00:00.000Z", 
  "taskDetail":"This is a test task detail"
}

Sample response OK:

{
	"success": true
}

Sample response ERROR:

{
  "success": false,
  "data": {
    "errorCode":99999,
    "description":"Some description related with the problem",
    "error": {} //will have extra info when error is not categorized
  }
}

Possible error codes:

* 10000 = Backend error
* 10001 = MSSQL error (uncategorized error)
* 10003 = Invalid Data (missing or wrong parameters)
* 10004 = This email is already in use
* 10005 = No token provided
* 10006 = Failed to authenticate token
* 10007 = The token is expired
